Settings-Application manager-%1$s-Permissions %2$s set to allow, To normal use the functions
Settings-Application manager-%1$s-Permissions %2$s set to allow，To normal use of %3$s and other functions ,Re-login to take effect
Suspended window permissions are not available

Suspended window permissions are not available for %1$s，voice call can not be minimized. Please open Settings>Application manager>%2$s>Permissions>Suspended window >set to allow. Different phones may have different paths and names.

Suspended window permissions are not available for %1$s，bing and voice call . Please open Settings>Application manager>%2$s>Permissions>Suspended window >set to allow. Different phones may have different paths and names.
